1.10.1.4 Kāyānupassanāpaṭikūlamanasikārapabba
Mūlapariyāyavagga
Mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutta
Kāyānupassanā
Kāyānupassanāpaṭikūlamanasikārapabba
110.
317Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā, tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati—  ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ papphāsaṃ antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttan’ti.
318Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ubhatomukhā putoḷi pūrā nānāvihitassa dhaññassa, seyyathidaṃ—  sālīnaṃ vīhīnaṃ muggānaṃ māsānaṃ tilānaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ. Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso muñcitvā paccavekkheyya—  ‘ime sālī ime vīhī ime muggā ime māsā ime tilā ime taṇḍulā’ti. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā, tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati—  ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā…pe…  muttan’ti.
319Iti ajjhattaṃ vā kāye kāyānupassī viharati…pe…  evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
320Paṭikūlamanasikārapabbaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
